tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select ip, avg(useraction.duration) FROM usersession where ip is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IP order by avg(useraction.duration) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select isp, avg(useraction.duration) FROM usersession where isp is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IsP order by avg(useraction.duration) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select city, avg(useraction.duration) FROM usersession where city is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by city order by avg(useraction.duration) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select browserMajorVersion, avg(useraction.duration) FROM usersession where browserMajorVersion is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by browserMajorVersion order by avg(useraction.duration) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select ip, sum(useraction.errorCount) FROM usersession where ip is not null and useraction.errorCount>0 and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IP order by sum(useraction.errorCount) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select isp, sum(useraction.errorCount) FROM usersession where isp is not null and useraction.errorCount>0 and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IsP order by sum(useraction.errorCount) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select browserMajorVersion, sum(useraction.errorCount) FROM usersession where browserMajorVersion is not null and useraction.errorCount>0 and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by browserMajorVersion order by sum(useraction.errorCount) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select city, sum(useraction.errorCount) FROM usersession where city is not null and useraction.errorCount>0 and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by city order by sum(useraction.errorCount) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select ip, count(*) FROM usersession where ip is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IP order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select isp, count(*) FROM usersession where isp is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by IsP order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select browserMajorVersion, count(*) FROM usersession where browserMajorVersion is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by browserMajorVersion order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select city, count(*) FROM usersession where city is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by city order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select useraction.application, count(*) FROM usersession where useraction.application is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by useraction.application order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select useraction.application, avg(useraction.duration) FROM usersession where useraction.application is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by useraction.application order by avg(useraction.duration) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select useraction.application, sum(useraction.errorCount) FROM usersession where useraction.application is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group by useraction.application order by sum(useraction.errorCount) DESC LIMIT 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT isp, AVG(useraction.networkTime) FROM usersession where isp is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group BY isp Order By AVG(useraction.networkTime) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT ip, AVG(useraction.networkTime) FROM usersession where ip is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group BY ip Order By AVG(useraction.networkTime) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT useraction.application, AVG(useraction.networkTime) FROM usersession where useraction.application is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group BY useraction.application Order By AVG(useraction.networkTime) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT browserMajorVersion, AVG(useraction.networkTime) FROM usersession where browserMajorVersion is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group BY browserMajorVersion Order By AVG(useraction.networkTime) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT city, AVG(useraction.networkTime) FROM usersession where city is not null and ip between "${MyVPN1}" and "${MyVPN2}" group BY City Order By AVG(useraction.networkTime) DESC
